function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clinical effectiveness measurement for face masks","Impact":"Increased risk of wearing inadequate protection","Mitigation":"Conduct clinical trials to measure the effectiveness of face masks","Technologies":"Clinical trial equipment, data analysis tools","People":"Users of face masks","Owner":"Health organizations, manufacturers"},{"Description":"Inconvenience and noise of purifying shield","Impact":"Reduced user compliance and comfort","Mitigation":"Redesign shield for better fit and noise reduction","Technologies":"3D scanning and printing, noise-cancelling technology","People":"Users of the purifying shield","Owner":"Manufacturers, product designers"}]}
